subject: Public Meeting: Community Advisory Board — May 15, 2025, 6:00 PM
body:
Hello,

You are invited to the public meeting of the Community Advisory Board.

Date: Thursday, May 15, 2025
Time: 6:00 PM – 8:00 PM
Location: City Hall, Council Chamber, 123 Main St.

Attached is the non-confidential agenda for the meeting. Key agenda items include:
- Welcome and introductions
- Public comment period
- Review of neighborhood improvements proposal
- Budget overview and Q&A
- Action items and next steps

If you plan to attend in person or virtually, please RSVP via the meeting page linked below. A livestream and recording will be available on the meeting page. If you need accommodations or have questions, contact Jane Doe at jane.doe@city.gov or (555) 555-0123.

We look forward to your participation.

Thank you,
City Office of Community Engagement
